jammed.name: Remote Override
jammed.desc: This mech can never gain the **jammed** condition.

immobilized-damage.name: Immobile
immobilized-damage.desc: If this mech were to receive the **immobilized** condition, it will suffer **1 damage** on this system instead.

knocked-down-damage.name: Stable
knocked-down-damage.desc: If this mech were to receive the **knocked down** condition, it will suffer **1 damage** on this system instead.
